key.clientmod:openTextbox.name: Open Textbox
messages.clientmod:log.noLastDeathPositi: You didn't die since you started Minecraft, you dummie!
messages.clientmod:radar.noEntitiesInRan: There are no entities in %s blocks range
messages.clientmod:radar.entitiesInRange: These are all the mobs in %s blocks range:
messages.clientmod:radar.noEntityTypeInR: There are no mobs of type %s in %s blocks range
messages.clientmod:radar.entityTypeInRan: There are %s mobs of type %s in %s blocks range:
messages.clientmod:ray.block: Hit Block "%1$s" at position %2$s, distance: %3$s blocks
messages.clientmod:ray.entity: Hit Entity "%1$s" at position %2$s, distance: %3$s blocks
messages.clientmod:ray.miss: No hit result found within %s blocks
messages.clientmod:waypoint.currentWaypo: The waypoint is currently at the position %s
messages.clientmod:waypoint.noWaypoint: There is currently no waypoint registered.
messages.clientmod:waypoint.waypointRemo: Waypoint at position %s has been removed.
messages.clientmod:reloading.server_reso: This server provides its own resource pack, make sure to reload resources to be able to see custom textures properly
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.name: Clientmod command input
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.supportedCom: The following commands are currently supported:
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.exception.mi: Make sure to enter a prefix!
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.exception.pr: No command with the prefix %s has been found!
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.exception.mi: This command needs at least one more parameter!
screen.clientmod:mainScreen.exception.in: This is not a valid parameter!
screen.clientmod:settingsScreen.name: Clientmod Settings
config.clientmod:notifyWhenMinceraftScre: Should Minecraft play a (loud) sound when the Minceraft logo is shown?
config.clientmod:drawReloadingBackground: Should there be a red background when reloading resources with F3+T?
config.clientmod:enhancedReloadingInfo.d: Should there be additional information displayed (like the current task, the duration of the reload, etc.) while reloading resources?
config.clientmod:reloadFade.name: Reload Fade
config.clientmod:reloadFade.description: Should the reload overlay fade in and out for two seconds before and after reloading is complete?
config.clientmod:reloadServerResources.d: Should server resource packs get automatically loaded into the client when joining a server?
config.clientmod:renderFluidEffects.name: Render Fluid Effects
config.clientmod:renderFluidEffects.desc: Should the water/lava fog and the respective FOV change be visible while being inside a fluid?
config.clientmod:renderEntitiesGlowing.d: Should entities in the player's vicinity appear as glowing?
config.clientmod:nightVision.name: Night Vision
config.clientmod:nightVision.description: Should the player be able to see as if he has Night Vision?
config.clientmod:betterFishingHook.name: Better Fishing Hook
config.clientmod:betterFishingHook.descr: Should a Fishing Hook change its texture when it is in open water?
config.clientmod:renderSpyglassOverlay.d: Should the Spyglass overlay be rendered when scoping through a Spyglass?
config.clientmod:invincibleVillagers.des: Should Villagers be invincible to direct player attacks?
config.clientmod:enhancedItemInfo.name: Enhanced Item Info
config.clientmod:enhancedItemInfo.descri: Should certain items, like enchanted books, have additional information about their data displayed?
setting.clientmod:sendMessagesWithTeamms: Should all your chat messages be sent to team members only?
